exposed.addDays: Adds the specified number of days to the date.
exposed.addMonths: Adds the specified number of months to the date.
exposed.date: Takes any value and returns a date object.
exposed.endOfDay: Returns the last second of the day.
exposed.endOfMonth: Returns the last day of the month.
exposed.endOfWeek: Returns the last day of the week.
exposed.endOfYear: Returns the last day of the year.
exposed.format: Takes a date object and returns it in a specified format.
exposed.getDiff: Returns the difference between two dates in the specified unit.
exposed.getMonth: Returns the month of the date.
exposed.getWeek: Returns the week of the year of the date.
exposed.getWeekArray: Returns an array of the days of the week of the date.
exposed.getWeekdays: Returns an array of the names of the days of the week.
exposed.isAfter: Returns true if the first date is after the second date.
exposed.isBefore: Returns true if the first date is before the second date.
exposed.isEqual: Returns true if the two dates are equal.
exposed.isSameDay: Returns true if the two dates are the same day.
exposed.isSameMonth: Returns true if the two dates are the same month.
exposed.isValid: Returns true if the date is valid.
exposed.isWithinRange: Returns true if the first date is within the range of the second and third dates.
exposed.locale: Returns the current locale being used.
exposed.getYear: Returns the year of the date.
exposed.setYear: Sets the year of the date.
exposed.startOfDay: Returns the first second of the day.
exposed.startOfMonth: Returns first day of the month.
exposed.startOfWeek: Returns the first day of the week.
exposed.startOfYear: Returns the first day of the year.
exposed.toJsDate: Converts date value to a JS Date Object.
